title: Deva Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine
description: Deva is a social enterprise of the Banteay Srey Project and offers training and employment to Cambodian Women. Housed in front of the women's spa, this fresh juice and smoothie cafe that offers an extensive Mediterranean-influenced menu with veggie tapas, fresh juices, and healthy smoothies. Uses fresh local produce in with the addition of a few imported ingredients. An organic vegetable garden onsite also supplies the cafe.
